<Text
        x = "40"
        y = "260"
        width = "100"
        height = "100"
        textSize = "48"
        textAlign = "center"
        text = "<"
        background = "rgba(2,49,81,255)"
        backgroundWhenActive = "rgba(2,30,60,255)"
        id = "leftBtn"
    />
    
    
    
        
        var weekday = new Array(7);
        weekday[0]=  "Sunday";
        weekday[1] = "Monday";
        weekday[2] = "Tuesday";
        weekday[3] = "Wednesday";
        weekday[4] = "Thursday";
        weekday[5] = "Friday";
        weekday[6] = "Saturday";
        
        var data = [{
            name : "Tizen Metting",
            time : "5:00PM~7:00PM"
        },{
            name : "GearS2 Metting",
            time : "2:00PM~3:00PM"
        },{
            name : "Weakly Metting",
            time : "1:00PM~2:00PM"
        }]
        
        var currentDate;
        function showDay(date) {
            currentDate = date;
            document.getElementById("day").text = date.getDate();
            document.getElementById("dayOfWeek").text = weekday[date.getDay()];
            
            var t = currentDate.getDate() % 3;
            
            document.getElementById("title").text = data[t].name
            document.getElementById("content").text = data[t].time
        }
        
        
        document.getElementById("leftBtn").onClick = function() {
            showDay(new Date(currentDate.getTime() - (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)))
        }
        
        document.getElementById("rightBtn").onClick = function() {
            showDay(new Date(currentDate.getTime() + (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)))
        }
        
        window.onKeyDown = function() {
            
        }
        
        window.onKeyUp = function(e){
            if(e == "Down" || e == "rotaryClockWise"){
                document.getElementById("rightBtn").onClick();
            }
            if(e == "Up" || e == "rotaryCounterClockWise"){
                document.getElementById("leftBtn").onClick();
            }
        };
        
        
        
        showDay(new Date());
